last_episode_to_air.name: Cliff Hanger
last_episode_to_air.overview: Location: Unknown.  Brad and Vanessa take part in a drag race and when Brad wins, Vanessa accuses him of cheating. Later, M.A.S.K. and V.E.N.O.M. take part in a race held in memory of the great ancestors of Nevada's tribe. Buzzard and Manta steal military documents that give them access to dangerous seeds that can wipe out entire populations by causing a giant plague. M.A.S.K. must recover the seeds from V.E.N.O.M. during the race and dispose of them. At the end of the race, Brad and Vanessa are neck in neck; Vanessa ends up winning, and Brad congratulates her. She is somehow surprised by his sportsmanship.

name: MASK
overview: M.A.S.K. is an animated television series produced by the French-American DIC Enterprises, Inc and Kenner. The series was based on the M.A.S.K. action figures. It was animated in Asia by studios; KK C&D Asia, Studio Juno, Studio World, and Ashi Production.

episodes.name: The Deathstone
episodes.overview: A radioactive meteor crashes on Earth and V.E.N.O.M. steals it by disguising Switchblade as a U.F.O.

episodes.name: The Star Chariot
episodes.overview: VENOM steals a mystical arrowhead rumored to point the way to an alien spacecraft buried in the desert.

episodes.name: The Book of Power
episodes.overview: Location: Nevada? VENOM steals the Book of Power, which is the key to the Lost City of Mong Paco and its giant jewel-covered idol.

episodes.name: Highway to Terror
episodes.overview: Location: Central City VENOM steals an army truck carrying plutonium. They need the plutonium for their earthquake machine.

episodes.name: Video VENOM
episodes.overview: Location: Town of Cliffwood, Colorado VENOM hypnotizes a small town, using the people to assemble and rebuild a military weapon.

episodes.name: Dinosaur Boy
episodes.overview: Location: Some Jungle VENOM kidnaps a young lizard creature. They intend to sell the creature's anti-bodies because it is believed that they will give longer life.

episodes.name: The Ultimate Weapon
episodes.overview: Location: Unknown V.E.N.O.M. has a device that jams the M.A.S.K. vehicle controls, causing Condor to crash into Shark.

episodes.name: The Roteks
episodes.overview: Location: Unknown V.E.N.O.M. has stolen a breed of metal-eating bugs developed for warfare. This episode has a spectacular crash of Thunderhawk in it.

episodes.name: The Oz Effect
episodes.overview: Location: Australia? Sly Rax disguises himself an aboriginal priest. V.E.N.O.M. has a machine that causes a giant vortex which they use to ""kidnap"" the village people. V.E.N.O.M. forces them to do slave labour in some sort of crystal mine. M.A.S.K. used their transport plane for the first time.

episodes.name: Death from the Sky
episodes.overview: Location: Norway V.E.N.O.M. has a tractor ray that they use to kidnap the president of the PNA. Then V.E.N.O.M. threatens to use the ray to break off a piece of a comet to destroy a city. Firecracker is damaged in this episode.

episodes.name: The Magma Mole
episodes.overview: Location: Japan V.E.N.O.M. has a drilling vehicle called The Magma Mole that they are using to burrow beneath Tokyo to create devastating floods. Their next target is Mount Fuji.

episodes.name: Solaria Park
episodes.overview: Location: Greece V.E.N.O.M. has built an amusement park to hide a giant heat ray weapon.

episodes.name: The Creeping Terror
episodes.overview: Location: Some Jungle VENOM has genetically altered caterpillar eggs to create giant caterpillars. They are using the giant caterpillars to clear away the vegetation in the jungle to reveal a map carved on the jungle floor. The map leads to the Hidden Valley, the location of an ancient source of great power -- a Myan crystal.

episodes.name: Assault on Liberty
episodes.overview: Location: New York, NY Matt, Scott, and T-Bob are attending a magic show on Liberty Island, New York harbour.

episodes.name: The Sceptre of Rajim
episodes.overview: Location: India V.E.N.O.M. steals a sceptre from the underground city of Rajim.

episodes.name: The Golden Goddess
episodes.overview: Location: Singapore V.E.N.O.M. is raiding temples and stealing golden relics, including The Golden Goddess of Sarawak. They are liquifying the gold and stealing it by pumping it through the city's old abandoned drainage system.

episodes.name: Mystery of the Rings
episodes.overview: Location: Unknown There are 3 valuable rings from the Renaissance that, when combined, will lead to a great ancient treasure. V.E.N.O.M. steals the rings and combine the rings on the ruins at Sunhenge.

episodes.name: Bad Vibrations
episodes.overview: Location: Hong Kong Millionaire Julian Fong hires V.E.N.O.M. to blow up buildings with the high-tech resonator bombs.

episodes.name: Ghost Bomb
episodes.overview: Location: Panama Brian, the Brain is a computer that controls a nuclear submarine. V.E.N.O.M. threatens to blow up the Panama Canal if their demands are not met.

episodes.name: Cold Fever
episodes.overview: Location: Alaska Bruce finds a man wandering in Alaska who has been exposed to a strange virus, and Bruce gets infected too. V.E.N.O.M. has the antidote, and they plan to sell it for lots of $$$.

episodes.name: Mardi Gras Mystery
episodes.overview: Location: New Orleans, LA During Mardi Gras, VENOM tries to obtain a super fuel.

episodes.name: The Secret of Life
episodes.overview: Location: Egypt Rax dresses up as a mummy and V.E.N.O.M. steals a stone tablet with a map leading to King Tut's tomb. They are after a golden scarab that contains ""The Secret of Life"".

episodes.name: Vanishing Point
episodes.overview: Location: Unknown V.E.N.O.M. hijacks planes. They have an 'impostor' airport in the desert and use a radar jammer to confuse the real airports.

episodes.name: Counter-Clockwise Caper
episodes.overview: Location: Las Vegas, Nevada VENOM conducts heists of Las Vegas casinos.

episodes.name: The Plant Show
episodes.overview: Location: Los Angeles, California Brad's rock band is performing at the Hollywood Bowl when giant plants begin to cause havoc all over the city.

episodes.name: Secret of the Andes
episodes.overview: Location: Cuzco, Peru A preserved Incan priest is discovered in the aftermath of an avalanche and promises the way to El Dorado, the Lost City of Gold.

episodes.name: Panda Power
episodes.overview: Location: China, Easter Island V.E.N.O.M. kidnaps a sculpter who is working on a large sculpture of a panda bear for a ceremony in China. They also kidnap some panda bears from a preserve, and they bring them to Easter Island. M.A.S.K. must get the pandas out of harm's way before they can battle V.E.N.O.M.

episodes.name: Blackout
episodes.overview: Location: Japan V.E.N.O.M. is draining power supplies with a vehicle called Blackout.

episodes.name: A Matter of Gravity
episodes.overview: Location: Philadelphia, Pennsylvania Firecracker is destroyed by a heat ray weapon attached to Switchblade. Hurricane is introduced at the end of the show by the name ""Night Stalker"".

episodes.name: The Lost Riches of Rio
episodes.overview: Location: Rio De Janeiro V.E.N.O.M. steals a worthless painting that is actually a map to a Nazi raider's gold stash inside Sugarloaf Mountain.

episodes.name: Deadly Blue Slime
episodes.overview: Location: Africa The blue monster is made of protoplasm, and it is a science experiment gone awry. It devours nearly anything in its way and its only weakness is salt.

episodes.name: The Currency of Conspiracy
episodes.overview: Location: Switzerland An ex-minister from West Germany hires V.E.N.O.M. to help him spread a virus that turns money bills into blank pieces of paper.

episodes.name: Caesar's Sword
episodes.overview: Location: Athens Rax disguises himself as Julius Caesar, in order to scare off some archaeologists. VENOM is searching for Caesar's Sword of Victory.

episodes.name: Peril in Paris
episodes.overview: Location: France Buddy disguises himself as Dagger and sneaks into VENOM's secret hide out, learning about their plans. The blueprint is a map that shows the location of a Nazi doomsday device built in WW2. Nightstalker is called Hurricane from this point on.

episodes.name: In Dutch
episodes.overview: Location: Holland A millionaire has hired V.E.N.O.M. to steal a machine that can cause ultra sonic vibrations. The millionaire wants to become vice president of the Netherlands, and if his demands are not met he will destroy all of Holland's dykes. He only wanted to bluff -- too bad Mayhem never bluffs.

episodes.name: The Lippizaner Mystery
episodes.overview: Location: Unknown V.E.N.O.M. steals the famous Lippizaner Stallions, earning $4 million in platinum bars from an Arab. At the end V.E.N.O.M. loses the money (by a laser shot from Shark) and they all quickly flee in Piranha.

episodes.name: The Sacred Rock
episodes.overview: Location: Australia V.E.N.O.M. is manipulating a tribe of aboriginals with holographic projections of flying rocks.

episodes.name: Curse of Solomon's Gorge
episodes.overview: Location: Africa Researchers in Africa discover a Golden Scarab which they believe to be part of a hidden treasure that belonged to a lost tribe of Egypt.

episodes.name: Green Nightmare
episodes.overview: Location: New Guinea Alex has made an exact replica of the M.A.S.K. crystal used to power up the masks. Matt tells a story about his father (Andrew) who got the crystal from a tribe leader named Warago in New Guinea.

episodes.name: Eyes of the Skull
episodes.overview: Location: San Francisco, USA V.E.N.O.M. steals an artifact, a so-called 'crystal skull' that allows x-ray vision. By using the skull during combat with M.A.S.K., Mayhem sees through the masks and discovers Matt Trakker's true identity.

episodes.name: Stop Motion
episodes.overview: Location: Indianapolis, Indiana Gloria is racing in the Indy 500 when all of the TV stations, cars on the racing track and other electronic devices around the stadium stop functioning.

episodes.name: The Artemis Enigma
episodes.overview: Location: Athens Some monks living in a mountain castle have a golden horn that can locate gold.

episodes.name: The Chinese Scorpion
episodes.overview: Location: China V.E.N.O.M. kidnaps a scientist who has located a treasure hidden in the Great Wall of China. Eyewitnesses say a giant metal scorpion took the professor.

episodes.name: The Riddle of the Raven Master
episodes.overview: Location: London, England V.E.N.O.M. uses ravens, trained by Vanessa, to steal the crown jewels, and as a diversion Rax has installed a bomb in Big Ben.

episodes.name: The Spectre of Captain Kidd
episodes.overview: Location: Unknown Matt, Hondo, Scott and T-Bob are visiting an island that once belonged to a famous captain named Captain Kidd.

episodes.name: The Secret of the Stones
episodes.overview: Location: Some Jungle V.E.N.O.M. steals a stone that makes objects weightless. The only problem is, the stone loses its power when it is removed from where they found it. Hondo uses his Blaster II mask (the one from Hurricane) for the first time.

episodes.name: The Lost Fleet
episodes.overview: Location: Island? V.E.N.O.M. steals sails from boats to make a balloon that can lift the village from its foundations.

episodes.name: Quest of the Canyon
episodes.overview: Location: Unknown V.E.N.O.M. is after a hidden treasure stolen by Jesse James in 1878 that has never been recovered. First appearance of Ace Riker and Slingshot.

episodes.name: Follow the Rainbow
episodes.overview: Location: Ireland V.E.N.O.M. is after a treasure that can be found at the end of a rainbow. First appearance of Calhoun Burns and Raven, as well as Julio Lopez and Firefly.

episodes.name: The Everglades Oddity
episodes.overview: Location: Unknown Matt is bitten by a snake and isn't able to lead the team against V.E.N.O.M. who are trying to steal a space shuttle. Alex Sector is Matt's temporary replacement as M.A.S.K. leader.

episodes.name: Dragonfire
episodes.overview: Location: Borneo V.E.N.O.M. is after a jade dragonhead that is kept in the Temple of the Dragon on Mount Kinabalu.

episodes.name: The Royal Cape Caper
episodes.overview: Location: Hawaii V.E.N.O.M. steals an artifact (a cape and helmet) and earns big money by selling fake replicas until M.A.S.K. puts an end to their scheme.

episodes.name: Patchwork Puzzle
episodes.overview: Location: Washington, DC V.E.N.O.M. steals a quilt and a fireplace screen from an exhibit in a museum. By following V.E.N.O.M.'s gas fumes with Hurricane's infra-red sensors, M.A.S.K. discovers V.E.N.O.M.'s secret hideout. By holding the screen in front of the quilt, a message in morse code is revealed, telling of a stash of 3 million dollars hidden by the Washington Monument.

episodes.name: Fog on Boulder Hill
episodes.overview: Location: Nevada? V.E.N.O.M. kidnaps an old woman who used to babysit Scott. In her car stolen $20 counterfeit plates are hidden. Lots of cool action around Boulder Hill in this episode. Also, Firecracker is back!

episodes.name: Plunder of Glowworm Grotto
episodes.overview: Location: New Zeland Julio is visiting a village in New Zealand. He's checking on a project of the Matt Trakker Foundation which helps the people preserve the natives way of life.

episodes.name: Stone Trees
episodes.overview: Location: Unknown Jacques is doing his daily job sawing trees when he hits a tree that's made out of stone and has an inscription on it. V.E.N.OM. steals the tree and translates the inscriptions in order to discover the location of a golden totem.

episodes.name: Incident in Istanbul
episodes.overview: Location: Istanbul V.E.N.O.M. hijacks an armored truck being escorted by Thunderhawk to a museum. The truck is carrying ""The Emperor's Chess Set"", which, when combined together with a painting, shows the location of a golden crown which is hidden inside a church.

episodes.name: The Creeping Desert
episodes.overview: Location: Acapulco Jose Sanchez, the owner of a large complex of Acapulco hotels, hires V.E.N.O.M. to destroy all other land around his own property, by turning it in to a desert wasteland.

episodes.name: The Scarlet Empress
episodes.overview: Location: Venezuela V.E.N.O.M. is trying to steal an giant aboriginal statue of the Scarlet Empress. At the end Calhoun accidentally fires his Gulliver mask and shrinks the statue. A bird flies by and takes the statue. Gorey calls his mask ""Samson"" rather than Powerhouse.

episodes.name: Venice Menace
episodes.overview: Location: Venice V.E.N.O.M. steals a chemical that turns water into jelly. They use it to cover a harbor, allowing Stinger to drive on the water so they can dig up the golden ship.

episodes.name: Treasure of the Nazca Plain
episodes.overview: Location: Nazca Plateau in South America MASK foils a plot by VENOM to steal an ancient South American treasure.

episodes.name: Disappearing Act
episodes.overview: Location: Unknown V.E.N.O.M. steals cars from an auto museum by shrinking them.

episodes.name: Gate Of Darkness
episodes.overview: Location: India V.E.N.O.M. lures a cobra from a shiva-festival using a floating flute. They are after an ivory throne that is hidden in a maze in the Himalayan Mountains. The markings on the back of the cobra's head are supposed to show the way through the maze.

episodes.name: The Manakara Giant
episodes.overview: Location: Nazca Plateau in South Africa A cargo ship crashes on a beach under mysterious circumstances. Native people say it is the ghost of Manakara. It is actually V.E.N.O.M. (obviously) and they have a strange new magnetic device that gets a hold of T-Bob, as well as the MASK vehicles.

episodes.name: Raiders of the Orient Express
episodes.overview: Location: Switzerland V.E.N.O.M. seeks ""mad"" King Ludwig's treasure, and pilfers the Orient Express for clues.

episodes.name: Demolition Duel to the Death
episodes.overview: Location: Unknown.  Buddy Hawks, Bruno 'Mad Dog' Shepard and Vanessa Warfield are about to participate in a demolition derby. Vanessa plots to do everything in her power to ensure she wins.

episodes.name: Where Eagles Dare
episodes.overview: Location: Aruba.  'We go out late at night, we go where eagles dare...' uhhh... what? Matt has to race against the Mayhem brothers in order to win 'the licence of transportation'.

episodes.name: Homeward Bound
episodes.overview: Location: India.  Ali Bombay takes a vacation in his hometown of Kandukar. He runs into V.E.N.O.M. who are using people for slave mine labour to recover pieces of a valuable meteorite hidden in a mountain.

episodes.name: The Battle of the Giants
episodes.overview: Location: Unknown.  After both Goliath and Buzzard are damaged in battle, Matt and Miles decide to finish the race on fair terms. Matt wins the trophy and the secret formula hidden inside. V.E.N.O.M. destroys the trophy and by doing so also destroys the formula.

episodes.name: Race Against Time
episodes.overview: Location: Mediterranean Sea.  The race goes along the Mediterranean Sea to the Rock of Gibraltar. Before the race, Brad is given a mission by Duane of the PNA. Brad has to recover a rare plant that can be used as the antidote for a fast spreading virus. Of course, V.E.N.O.M. is after the plant too.

episodes.name: Challenge of the Masters
episodes.overview: Location: Unknown.  There is a microfilm hidden in a trophy that contains information to access any computer in the world (including M.A.S.K.'s). Vanessa, Floyd and Ali compete in the race for the trophy, while Bruno and Calhoun take part in a demolition derby. Ali wins the race, and the trophy, but V.E.N.O.M. steal the trophy. In the end it turns out that the trophy they stole was a fake.

episodes.name: For One Shining Moment
episodes.overview: Location: Chicago.  V.E.N.O.M. organizes a 'charity race' between Matt in Goliath and Miles in Buzzard. Bruno impersonates Brad's voice in a call for help to lure Clutch into a V.E.N.O.M. trap. V.E.N.O.M. double-crosses MASK and Miles steals the charity money.

episodes.name: High Noon
episodes.overview: Location: Unknown During the Wild West Festival an air race, boat race and a road race take place. The Buzzard plane (flown by the drone) attacks the M.A.S.K. agents, while the Mayhem Bros. break into a secret airplane test center to steal plans for a new jet. Vanessa and Bruno confuse M.A.S.K. by pretending to show some sportsmanship. In the end Ace captures Vanessa and offers to release her if she hands over the plans she's carrying. She agrees.

episodes.name: The Battle for Baja
episodes.overview: Location: Unknown.  M.A.S.K. and V.E.N.O.M. race across the Baja dessert. Matt has loaned Goliath 1 to the president's son R'aul Vega for the race. V.E.N.O.M. wants to kidnap Vega in order to hold him for ransom. After an ambush by Lester, V.E.N.O.M. gets a hold of Vega. M.A.S.K. comes to the rescue and Vega ends up winning the race with a little help from Clutch and Ali.

episodes.name: Cliff Hanger
episodes.overview: Location: Unknown.  Brad and Vanessa take part in a drag race and when Brad wins, Vanessa accuses him of cheating. Later, M.A.S.K. and V.E.N.O.M. take part in a race held in memory of the great ancestors of Nevada's tribe. Buzzard and Manta steal military documents that give them access to dangerous seeds that can wipe out entire populations by causing a giant plague. M.A.S.K. must recover the seeds from V.E.N.O.M. during the race and dispose of them. At the end of the race, Brad and Vanessa are neck in neck; Vanessa ends up winning, and Brad congratulates her. She is somehow surprised by his sportsmanship.
